title: President Truman's rear platform remarks in Crestline, Ohio
Description: President Harry S. Truman's rear platform remarks in Crestline, Ohio.
Preservation: Master and reference reel-to-reel audio tapes prepared by NARA ca. 1980\'s.  Master and reference cd\'s and reel-to-reel audio tape prepared by Cutting Corp. ca. 2001.

title: President Truman, Rear platform remarks, Plaistow, New Hampshire, October 17, 1952
Description: Rear platform remarks, Plaistow, New Hampshire, October 17, 1952, 11:50 a.m. Transcript available in Public Papers of the Presidents, Harry S. Truman, 1952-1953, p844-846.

title: President Truman, Rear Platform Remarks, Devils Lake, North Dakota
Description: President Harry S. Truman's Rear Platform Remarks, Devils Lake, North Dakota, September 29, 1952, 2:30 p.m. He is campaigning on behalf of Adlai Stevenson's presidential campaign. Transcript available in Public Papers of the Presidents, Harry S. Truman, 1952.
Preservation: Reel-to-reel master and reference audio tapes from NARA, ca. 1980\'s; reel-to-reel audio tape and cd from Cutting Corp., ca. 2001.

title: President Truman, Rear platform remarks, Bridgeport, Pennsylvania, October 21, 1952
Description: President Harry S. Truman's rear platform remarks, Bridgeport, Pennsylvania, October 21, 1952, 6:50pm. Transcript available in Public Papers of the Presidents, Harry S. Truman, 1952-53.  President Truman spoke on behalf of the Democratic ticket of Adlai Stevenson and John Sparkman.
Preservation: Master and reference reel-to-reel audio tapes at 7-1/2 ips, created by NARA ca. 1980\'s, and reel-to-reel audio tape at 7-1/2 ips and master and reference cd\'s created by Cutting Corp. ca. 2001.

title: President Truman's rear platform remarks in Everett, Washington.
Description: Dan Mather. Also speaking: Henry Arends, Mayor of Everett, and Mon Wallgren, Governor of Washington. Audio ends before the end of President Truman's remarks. In two parts.

title: President Trumans, Rear platform  remarks in Martinsburg, WV
Description: President Harry S. Truman's, Rear platform  remarks in Martinsburg, WV

title: President Truman, Rear platform remarks, Malden, Massachusetts, October 17, 1952
Description: Rear platform remarks, Malden, Massachusetts, October 17, 1952, 2:42 p.m. Transcript available in Public Papers of the Presidents, Harry S. Truman, 1952-1953, p852-854
